text: waldhyn yarmun zwjathm balzna, walam yakun lahum shuhada' ealaa athamhm lhnn 'iilaa anfshm, faealaa alwahid minhum 'an yashhad 'amam alqadi arbe marrat bqwlh: 'ashhad biallah 'aniy sadiq fima rmytha bih min alzna, wayazid fi alshahadat alkhamisat aldaewat ealaa nafsih basthqaqh laenat allah 'iin kan kadhbana fi qwlh
